### Rental, Maintenance and Laundry of Dental Clinic Uniforms (RFP) (reference PW-22-01009151)
### Demande de Proposition - Uniformes Personnel Dentaires (RFP) (Référence PW-22-01009151)

**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals for an all-inclusive uniform rental service contract to supply dental clinic uniforms to its personnel.

**Notice Details**
----------------

*   **Procurement Category**: Supply and Services (SRVTGD)
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

**RFP Overview**
----------------

The proposed contract will cover the rental, maintenance, replacement, and laundry of dental clinic uniforms. The items included in the contract are:

*   Scrub Top
*   Scrub Bottom
*   Lab Coat (Full Length)
*   Warm-up Jacket
*   Small Towel
*   Large Towel

**Proposal Instructions**
-------------------------

To respond to this RFP, vendors are required to submit a proposal that includes:

*   A complete proposal
*   Proof of business registration
*   Proof of experience

**Evaluation Criteria**
-------------------------

The evaluation process will assess the technical merits of the proposal based on the following criteria:

*   **Experience and Capabilities**: Vendor experience and capabilities in providing similar services.
*   **Quality Management**: Vendor's quality management systems and procedures.
*   **Equipment and Supplies**: Description and specifications of the equipment and supplies used by the vendor.

**RFP Documents**
-----------------

Proposals must be submitted in English or French. All RFP documents are available on the Canadabuys website:

*   English RFP document: [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/04/738c74ac7c8ad08a2747ee0d49717154/request_for_proposal_-_dental_uniforms.pdf)
*   French RFP document: [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/04/342b4eed2bc687814b88ea47ff90abd2/demande_de_proposition_-_uniformes_personnel_dentaire.pdf)
